news.title: Gurugram civic body commissioner tells officials to improve property tax recovery
news.para: In a meeting held with the zonal taxation department and enforcement branch officials on Friday, the commissioner directed the zonal taxation officers to improve their performance and recovery by September 15.

news.title: Fly ash ideal for manufacturing cement, concrete, bricks & tiles: NTPC
news.para: The fly ash generated at the NTPC is ideal for manufacturing cement, concrete, concrete products, bricks and tiles, claimed the general manager (ash handling) K Gopala Krishna.

news.title: Pune civic body mops up Rs 1,000 crore in property tax in five months
news.para: Last year, the PMC had mopped up Rs 790.37crore during April 1, 2020 to August 27, 2020. This year, the collection during the same period is Rs 1001.88 crore.

news.title: DMIC: Project-hit families to get flats in Greater Noida
news.para: ​To establish a multi-modal logistics and transport hub in the Dadri region, the district administration needs to acquire nearly 84 hectares of land in four villages — Chithehra, Kathehra, Palla and Bodaki.

news.title: Jaipur: UDH may ease construction norms near defence areas
news.para: An official said, “The Jaipur Development Authority (JDA) has forwarded the proposal to the UDH. If approved, it would not be mandatory for owners to obtain a No Objection Certificate (NOC) to carry out construction activity in the mentioned limits.”

news.title: Pune: Deadline to submit suggestions on development plan extended
news.para: The state urban development department issued a notification regarding the same on Friday. The previous deadline was September 1, which has been extended till September 16.

news.title: First drone survey in Aravalis completed, 550 notices sent
news.para: The survey was undertaken in the wake of the Supreme Court’s July 23 direction during its hearing on the illegal colony in Faridabad’s Khori, which it had ordered demolished, that no illegal construction on Aravali land, including farmhouses, commercial establishments and religious structures, should be spared.

news.title: Delhi: EDMC to give relief from demolition work on properties in unauthorised colonies
news.para: "The proposal approved by the standing committee was on Friday approved by the House. It will give major relief to people, especially those from the low-resource group, who plough in their hard-earned money on their houses," Mayor Shyam Sunder Aggarwal said.

news.title: SC issues notices to Haryana government, Faridabad civic body in Khori Gaon case
news.para: The Supreme Court had on June 07, 2021, in its order directed the Haryana government and the other authorities concerned, to remove around 10,000 residential houses constructed illegally at Khori village in Haryana's Aravali forest area.

news.title: Odisha government approves sand policy 2021
news.para: The Cabinet also approved the Odisha Sand Policy, 2021 which will ensure sustainable mining of it in the state. The policy has been framed considering the demand-supply situation, identification of sources, mining plan, environment and other statutory clearances, Mohapatra said.

news.title: Chandigarh: No role of private person or middlemen in allotment of flats, clarifies CHB
news.para: Board’s CEO Yashpal Garg said that in the general housing scheme, the applications are invited from general public through public notices in newspapers and on the website of CHB about launch of general housing scheme with its detailed features and eligibility conditions.

news.title: Delhi: NDMC offers property tax waiver to residential plots, houses up to 50 sq meter
news.para: The benefit will accrue only to such owners who themselves are residing in such properties and has not rented it out to a tenant and where members of only one family are staying.

news.title: Mumbai: Auditor's bail plea rejected in PMC bank scam case
news.para: “Relying on the audit report, the financial status of the bank is determined, but the applicant deliberately ignored the huge loan amount of HDIL group of companies," the court said.

news.title: Tambaram residents hope corporation status will rid them of civic woes
news.para: These areas, where rents are relatively cheaper and where accessibility through suburban trains (Chennai-Tambaram section) and buses on GST Road is excellent, are all rapidly growing.

news.title: NFRA flags lapses in statutory audit of Jaiprakash Associates in 2017-18
news.para: Another observation is that the audit firm did not obtain sufficient appropriate audit evidence to understand the impact that the insolvency petition against JIL (Jaypee Infratech Ltd) had on the company.
